values: Make me belive that it all lies in our hands...

Man, I sat down and thought real hard about why the world sucked and I think I came up with an answer.  I was talking to my boss today and he was saying that he didn't understand why people think that they are entitled to anything, and it hit me. Everyone on this planet thinks that thier individual opinion or life matters, but it doesn't. If everyone stopped living for themselves and thought of the whole picture, whether it was the entire human race or just a body of people, the world would run alot smoother. It doesn't really matter to me, I'm going to kill all of you anyways, but that's just a thought.

I'm not crazy.  You all are crazy, you trust in carpenters and peaceful men when there are other more "real" things out there.  I can only shake my head in disgust.  You people are so blind, and I cannot change that.  I will only laugh on that fateful day when your destinies are realized.  I feel sorry for all of you.

Its time for the earth to revert back, it needs to.  I'm about to go hard core on Gaia and also on the elven leaders here.  They are still so stubborn.  They do not realize that I am a one man Armageddon.  I grow stronger everyday, not even Xen could stop me in his current state.  I don't know why I am ranting, I just hate this existence.  It saddens that the human race is mortal, they will not be able to experience my rise as Eternal Emperor, God of the Vampires, they will know the meaning of fear. All of you will. Only those who swear their allegiance to our cause will be spared.  Xen may save you but I won't.  Soon, three new guardians will be awakened and all of Heaven and Hell will tremble.

Hmmm... I really hate most everybody.  This planet is so lucky it hasn't reverted back yet.  A lot of people are going to die if they don't change their ways, if not by ignorance then by me.  All you dumb asses out there, you're gonna die soon, got it? I'm gonna kill every single one of you. Oh, and I'm also gonna kill all of you faggots.  You better hope that I don't catch you in public.  Out of the ashes of this world will rise a new order, mine. I will set aside lands and protection for those who are willing to work and learn.  I will destroy all that stands between me and my goals. I will face God and deny him on his throne.  He will know the meaning of fear, but this will all come with time.  Just wait and watch, the realms stir and all you pathetic humans know nothing of it. Open your eyes and realize the truth...
I've been noticing that when people talk, all I hear is "BLAH BLAH BLAH, I SUCK!!!"... OH well...

Yeah I was just reading the journal posts from some of my friends and whatnot and I just realized how much the people of the world complain.  OK WE ARE IN A FUCKING WAR, PEOPLE ARE GOING TO DIE, NOW SHUT UP AND QUIT COMPLAINING!!!  THINGS AREN'T GOING TO GO EXACTLY HOW YOU WANT THEM, SUCK IT UP AND SIT AND DOWN AND DON'T TALK ANYMORE!!! YOU PEOPLE MAKE ME WANNA KILL YOU ALL!!! I CAN'T WATCH THE NEWS ANYMORE CAUSE ALL THEY DO IS COMPLAIN!!!  I HATE DEMOCRATS CAUSE ALL THEY DO IS COMPLAIN!!! FUCK HOWARD DEAN AND JOHN KERRY!!! THEY NEED TO QUIT BITCHING ABOUT EVERYTHING AND KILL THEMSELVES!!! Anyways, I know that I am complaining now but that's just cause people have driven me past my ability to not complain about stuff and it take a lot to push me past that point. So anyways, DOWN WITH DEMONCRATS AND COMPLAINERS!!! YAH YAH YAH!!!

I don't know, I've just been busy with certain personal stuffs and stuff that's happening with Brittane, those who know obviously know what I am talking about. We are doing really good and everything its just that I've got a lot of things to take care of.  I am also thinking of renting a home soon whenever I can get a job that pays enough or I can find someone who would want to share a home with Britt and I.  Yah Yah Yah... Anyways yeah that's what I've been doing and whatnot so yeah. Word.
My New SN for aim is KiausSattria.....obviously.... Haha! So if you find me on IM me...or email me at KiausSattria@netscape.net
Its been a long time...oh well.... I didn't get to see wrestlemania 20.... I'm sad... Oh well...

...Falling...
I can't stop myself anymore,
I've lost control,
Scars still bleed,
Pain still flows,
End this agony,
Let me find peace...

I don't know...I need to do something, I can't keep doing this. I hurt people by caring about them, I don't want you to be tired Britt, I don't want you to be sick, nothing like that, but I tell you something and you get upset with me. I know I could have probably said it in a better way but what is it that you want me to do? What I am doing isn't working obviously...tell me, what needs to happen? I don't know.

Ok, Saturday night, at fuggin' 12:30, I got my ass up and went to the Applebee's for the rendouvs for the trip.  I was there for about ten minutes then Britt got there. She sat next to me, which made for an interesting bus ride... *wink wink* But the bus ride was great, I was sleepy so Britt sang me to sleep. It was pretty, I love that girl. But, yeah, she sang me a song that she wrote for me. Yeah, Uhmmm.... Santa Monica was nice, the fuggin' arcade wasn't open. It sucked. But yeah, Britt went into the ocean and got sick for a while, but I took care of her. At Little Tokyo, we went to look for the Yao-Han Plaza and the J-Pan Arcade there, but we split up to see who could find it. I found it, mwahahaha.... But yeeaaahhh.... I got a 78 combo on Drop Out, standard, a 26 combo on Sakura, Oni, and a 178 combo on Era, Heavy. It rocked.... We went to China Town and had Chinese food at this place that will sell you an entire pig, cooked and pakaged for $160. Next year, me and Britt are gonna buy one...hehe. Uhmmm.... She bought me a Rouni Kenshin CD which rox and a sword, its cool. Then we went home, and yeah, it was long. But me and Britt had some fun...hehe... Yeah... ^_^

Monday: Britt called me at ten and kinda woke me up, which I actually enjoyed waking up to her voice. But yeah, she went with me to my Grandmas and then yeah.... I'll leave the rest to your imagination...^_^ hehe....

Yesterday, Britt came over, we had dinner, and got to watch the full moon. It was beautiful. Well, I don't know, the light of the moon seems to make her even more beautiful everytime I see her. Well, not just the moon, but she is more beautiful everytime I see her, just cause I fall even more in love with her everyday. So yeah, yesterday was a very special day for the both of us.

YOU ARE WATER!

Your inner element is one of great compassion and
love. You are an extremely kind-hearted person
who tends to care more about helping others
than themselves at times. You gravitate to
people who need help or just a shoulder to cry
on and you provide them with the support they
need. You harbor an intense compassion for
others that is truly admirable. You are an
incredibly easy-going person who just goes with
the flow and tries to be comfortable no matter
what. You tend to collect things, little
reminders or memories of time gone past. Any
career that will allow you to help others in
any way is ideal for you. Love is a essential
element in your life, and your search for the
one and only for you is paramount to all
things. The one you choose with have to be
loyal, honest, and able to share their emotions
with you.
Your greatest strengths are your ability to bond
with others and help them through the tough
times. Your weaknesses are your tendency to get
overly emotional on things and drive those you
care about away with your emotional outbursts.
Balancing your strengths and weaknesses is
crucial for you to achieve balance in your
life.
Astrologically, Water is associated with the signs
of Cancer, Scorpio and Pisces. You are most
compatible for either love or friendship with
another Water Elemental or with an Earth. You
are least compatible with a Fire Elemental.

Now that you have an idea of your strengths and
weaknesses, why don't you put them to the test?
If you follow my lead I can take you to a game
world where you can explore different sides of
yourself and taste real power....

Yeah, some of you do not know who I am... So, I'll tell you...

Rgutayu Daktito, Pre-memory (rough translation): I don't know what happened in this lifetime, but I had something to do with the Moon... This is when I heard a chant that was exactly like the Inkubus Sukkubus song "Wytches Chant"...I am still pondering this lifetime...

Yakari Lunnum (a Vampire's night): I was born of a pair of vampire possessed humans that lost thier wits and procreated.  This allowed me to be born on two planes, rather than just the physical or the ethereal plane, which gave me theorectical immortality. This immortality was only thoerectical due to the fact that I was able to live forever because my etheic body prevented aging past the age of about 25, and I could only be killed if both my physical and etheric bodies were destroyed at the same time, this meant that you had to kill me and then the spirit of the vampire that was infused in my soul.  If I were physically damaged, I would heal quickly due to my previous life, which I am not aware of completely, and would continue to live no matter how mortal the wound. If my soul were reaved, it would return quickly to my body because of the bond the vampirism had with my body. I was a vampire, not a etheric blob, but a living, breathing, physical vampire. But my parents abandoned me as a sacrifice to be eaten by the demon, Rigattria. Rigattria, also known as the Scourge of the Eastern Plane, saw my potential and took me under his wing as a stepson. He trained me to be fierce and very evil. I would travel the world, destroy all that got in my way or threatened me in anyway, whether it be a threat or not. I roamed far and wide. During the second age, I was on a ship named, the Karithis Barudus where I met Drew for the first time, we exchanged looks and dismissed each other just as quickly, he then destroyed the ship. I got away by swim away quickly before he destroyed it. My cloak sank...I loved this cloak, it gave me the power of the Heavens, Moonlighting...Which allowed me to directly meld with the Moon's energy and become literally invincible. My body was severly damaged by the water, but I survived. I roamed home and rested for a few years. Then I spread my reign of destruction across the world again. Then Rigattria gave me the soul reaving, Atorgaturiya Monyalun, or Moon Reaver (very roughly translated) this gave me direct control of the Moon, its phases, and orbit. He was owner of the Moon at this time, due to the fact that the Moon god had disappeared for quite some time.  The Moon itself was now mine, which explains why I am so lunar oriented now. But, I never used this. I continued to live my life the same until I met Anondaris, a beautiful girl in a town in northeastern, what is now, Greece. I became infatuated with her, sharing passion and lust with her, which her father, Iyadi, did not like. He became enraged and began to attack me, I retaliated and destroyed the entire village, including Anondaris. I feel to my knees, pondering my existence when Iyadi banished me. At this time I had not learned that Rigattria had been defeated and sealed within my body. SO I stayed between realms for more than 5,000 years. The only way I could be release was to be reborn as a pathetic human, earthbound and all. I still have Rigattria sealed within me, and I plan to release him soon. There's isa brief overview of my past life...

I just realized something that makes me wonder. I am one of the most inherently evil and dark creatures the world will ever know, yet somehow, I am fighting a war for the sake of mankind. What the hell? How ironic is that? Should I be fighting for the souls of mankind as my trophy? Yes, but do I believe in that? NO. It doesn't matter to me, the dark elemental within me is above that. It is hilarious. The vampire in me is above that. That is also hilarious. My choices seem to lead me to hilarity at times. And I will never truly ever be divine, which to me is not a bad deal. There are too many rules and regulations that creatures of "divine" nature must abide by. Oh well, but I can be divine in the sense that my Moon's energy will purify me soon enough so that I can draw directly off of it and use Lunar energy to live rather than normal etheric energy. That would be awesome, it would be like I was a descendant of the Moon itself. But the problem is, I don't know how to achieve this directly. SO, I'm screwed. But, I'm still working on it nonetheless. Hehe, the reign of light has just begun, and I am at the forefront of this movement...What's my problem? *shrugs* I don't know, and really don't care. Word...
